name: Cnews.cz 2017 dark
additional_info:
Keep in mind this theme does not work as an adblocker. Ads may mess with the theme.

Changelog:
Version 1.7
- fixed homepage and background after template change
- hiding ad spots
Version 1.6
- fixed background after template change
Version 1.5
- fixed chapter selection
Version 1.4
- fixed twitter quotes
Version 1.3
- fixed tables
Version 1.2
- fixed footer
Version 1.1
- fixed tags (categories) and footer; now only applies to the site (not the forum)
- added option to change the color of textarea
Version 1.0
- initial release
